name: Defense Task Force - Sci Fi Tower Defense
description: Defense Task Force Featuring Large Scale Procedurally Generated Tower Defense Battles with FPS Quality Visuals and Infinite Waves. 10 tower types, with different attacks , 3 levels plus boosts. 25 Enemy alien species: Regulars, Swarmers, Racers, Cloakers, Healers, Boss Units and Spawners.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 7 64 Bit sp2+, Windows 8.0, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.4 Ghz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 (shader model 5) GPU 1GB VRam (NVidia GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5830) or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0-compatible, 16-bit
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 7 64 Bit sp2+, Windows 8.0, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Core I5 3.0 GHz Quad Core Processor or better Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 (shader model 5) GPU 2GB VRam (NVidia GTX 680 /  AMD Radeon HD 7970) or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0-compatible, 16-bit
